content: materials cascade 220 superwash 1 ball main color m 1 ball contrast color c takes total 86 yards approx needles us 6 16 circular **note 2/2015** i am sorry that the headband seems to be too big for many people after blocking mine measured 23 try using a smaller needle if you have a smaller head or miss out a repeat i think perhaps our family have bigger heads than the norm as it fitted my daughter perfectly i have updated the pattern to include a smaller size
